entry.title: Data Processing
entry.summary:
Data Processing¶

This project uses MIMIC III v1.4 as the main dataset. We choose the variable hospital_expire_flag in ADMISSIONS.csv file as target variable, and we want to predict the death risk for patients who enter ICU for the first time. Therefore, our main purpose in data processing part is to find variables that related to the target variable for the next part of data analysis. To find these variables, we mainly use four files: LABEVENTS.csv, ICUSTAYS.csv, ADMISSIONS.csv, D_LABITEMS.csv, PATIENTS.csv

div.cell {

  display: -webkit-box;
  -webkit-box-orient: vertical;

  margin: 0px;

  position: relative;

}

}

}

.prompt {
  /* This needs to be wide enough for 3 digit prompt numbers: In[100]: */
  min-width: 14ex;
  /* This padding is tuned to match the padding on the CodeMirror editor. */

  font-family: monospace;

  -webkit-user-select: none;
  -khtml-user-select: none;
  -moz-user-select: none;
  -ms-user-select: none;
  user-select: none;
  /* Use default cursor */

}

/* The following gets added to the <head> if it is detected that the user has a
 * monospace font with inconsistent normal/bold/italic height.  See
 * notebookmain.js.  Such fonts will have keywords vertically offset with
 * respect to the rest of the text.  The user should select a better font.
 * See: https://github.com/ipython/ipython/issues/1503
 *
 * .CodeMirror span {
 *      vertical-align: bottom;
 * }
 */
.CodeMirror {
  line-height: 1.21429em;
  /* Changed from 1em to our global default */
  font-size: 14px;
  height: auto;
  /* Changed to auto to autogrow */
  background: none;
  /* Changed from white to allow our bg to show through */
}
.CodeMirror-scroll {
  /*  The CodeMirror docs are a bit fuzzy on if overflow-y should be hidden or visible.*/
  /*  We have found that if it is visible, vertical scrollbars appear with font size changes.*/
  overflow-y: hidden;
  overflow-x: auto;
}
.CodeMirror-lines {
  /* In CM2, this used to be 0.4em, but in CM3 it went to 4px. We need the em value because */
  /* we have set a different line-height and want this to scale with that. */
  /* Note that this should set vertical padding only, since CodeMirror assumes
       that horizontal padding will be set on CodeMirror pre */
  padding: 0.4em 0;
}
.CodeMirror-linenumber {
  padding: 0 8px 0 4px;
}
.CodeMirror-gutters {
  border-bottom-left-radius: 2px;
  border-top-left-radius: 2px;
}
.CodeMirror pre {
  /* In CM3 this went to 4px from 0 in CM2. This sets horizontal padding only,
    use .CodeMirror-lines for vertical */
  padding: 0 0.4em;
  border: 0;
  border-radius: 0;
}
.CodeMirror-cursor {
  border-left: 1.4px solid black;
}
@media screen and (min-width: 2138px) and (max-width: 4319px) {
  .CodeMirror-cursor {
    border-left: 2px solid black;
  }
}
@media screen and (min-width: 4320px) {
  .CodeMirror-cursor {
    border-left: 4px solid black;
  }
}

div.output_wrapper {
  /* this position must be relative to enable descendents to be absolute within it */
  position: relative;
  /* Old browsers */
  display: -webkit-box;
  -webkit-box-orient: vertical;
  -webkit-box-align: stretch;
  display: -moz-box;
  -moz-box-orient: vertical;
  -moz-box-align: stretch;
  display: box;
  box-orient: vertical;
  box-align: stretch;
  /* Modern browsers */
  display: flex;
  flex-direction: column;
  align-items: stretch;
  z-index: 1;
}
/* class for the output area when it should be height-limited */
div.output_scroll {
  /* ideally, this would be max-height, but FF barfs all over that */
  height: 24em;
  /* FF needs this *and the wrapper* to specify full width, or it will shrinkwrap */
  width: 100%;
  overflow: auto;
  border-radius: 2px;
  -webkit-box-shadow: inset 0 2px 8px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.8);
  box-shadow: inset 0 2px 8px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.8);
  display: block;
}
/* output div while it is collapsed */
div.output_collapsed {
  margin: 0px;
  padding: 0px;
  /* Old browsers */
  display: -webkit-box;
  -webkit-box-orient: vertical;
  -webkit-box-align: stretch;
  display: -moz-box;

  display: box;

}
div.out_prompt_overlay {
  height: 100%;

}
div.out_prompt_overlay:hover {
  /* use inner shadow to get border that is computed the same on WebKit/FF */
  -webkit-box-shadow: inset 0 0 1px #000;
  box-shadow: inset 0 0 1px #000;
  background: rgba(240, 240, 240, 0.5);
}
div.output_prompt {
  color: #D84315;
}
/* This class is the outer container of all output sections. */
div.output_area {
  padding: 0px;
  page-break-inside: avoid;
  /* Old browsers */
  display: -webkit-box;
  -webkit-box-orient: horizontal;
  -webkit-box-align: stretch;

}

}
div.output_area 
div.output_area

}

}

/* This is needed to protect the pre formating from global settings such
   as that of bootstrap */
.output {
  /* Old browsers */
  display: -webkit-box;
  -webkit-box-orient: vertical;
  -webkit-box-align: stretch;
  display: -moz-box;

div.output_area pre {
  margin: 0;
  padding: 1px 0 1px 0;
  border: 0;
  vertical-align: baseline;
  color: black;
  background-color: transparent;
  border-radius: 0;
}
/* This class is for the output subarea inside the output_area and after
   the prompt div. */
div.output_subarea {
  overflow-x: auto;
  padding: 0.4em;
  /* Old browsers */
  -webkit-box-flex: 1;
  -moz-box-flex: 1;
  box-flex: 1;
  /* Modern browsers */
  flex: 1;
  max-width: calc(100% - 14ex);
}
div.output_scroll div.output_subarea {
  overflow-x: visible;
}
/* The rest of the output_* classes are for special styling of the different
   output types */
/* all text output has this class: */
div.output_text {
  text-align: left;
  color: #000;
  /* This has to match that of the the CodeMirror class line-height below */
  line-height: 1.21429em;
}
/* stdout/stderr are 'text' as well as 'stream', but execute_result/error are *not* streams */
div.output_stderr {
  background: #fdd;
  /* very light red background for stderr */
}
div.output_latex {
  text-align: left;
}
/* Empty output_javascript divs should have no height */
div.output_javascript:empty {

}

/* raw_input styles */
div.raw_input_container {
  line-height: 1.21429em;

}
input.raw_input {
  font-family: monospace;
  font-size: inherit;
  color: inherit;
  width: auto;
  /* make sure input baseline aligns with prompt */
  vertical-align: baseline;
  /* padding + margin = 0.5em between prompt and cursor */
  padding: 0em 0.25em;
  margin: 0em 0.25em;
}
input.raw_input:focus {

}

</div><div class="inner_cell">
<div class="text_cell_render border-box-sizing rendered_html">
<h1 id="Data-Processing">Data Processing<a class="anchor-link" href="#Data-Processing">¶</a></h1>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<div class="cell border-box-sizing text_cell rendered"><div class="prompt input_prompt">
</div><div class="inner_cell">
<div class="text_cell_render border-box-sizing rendered_html">
<p>This project uses MIMIC III v1.4 as the main dataset. We choose the variable <strong>hospital_expire_flag</strong> in <em>ADMISSIONS.csv</em> file as target variable, and we want to predict the death risk for patients who enter ICU for the first time. Therefore, our main purpose in data processing part is to find variables that related to the target variable for the next part of data analysis. To find these variables, we mainly use four files:
<em>LABEVENTS.csv, ICUSTAYS.csv, ADMISSIONS.csv, D_LABITEMS.csv, PATIENTS.csv</em>.</p>

</div>
</div>
</div>
<div class="cell border-box-sizing text_cell rendered"><div class="prompt input_prompt">
</div><div class="inner_cell">
<div class="text_cell_render border-box-sizing rendered_html">
<h4 id="Load-libraries">Load libraries<a class="anchor-link" href="#Load-libraries">¶</a></h4>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<div class="cell border-box-sizing code_cell rendered">
<div class="input">
<div class="prompt input_prompt">In [6]:</div>
<div class="inner_cell">
    <div class="input_area">
<div class=" highlight hl-ipython3"><pre><span></span><span class="kn">import</span> <span class="nn">pandas</span> <span class="k">as</span> <span class="nn">pd</span>
<span class="kn">import</span> <span class="nn">numpy</span> <span class="k">as</span> <span class="nn">np</span>
<span class="kn">from</span> <span class="nn">sklearn.model_selection</span> <span class="kn">import</span> <span class="n">train_test_split</span>
<span class="kn">from</span> <span class="nn">sklearn.linear_model</span> <span class="kn">import</span> <span class="n">LogisticRegression</span>
<span class="kn">from</span> <span class="nn">sklearn</span> <span class="kn">import</span> <span class="n">metrics</span>
</pre></div>

    </div>
</div>
</div>

</div>
<div class="cell border-box-sizing text_cell rendered"><div class="prompt input_prompt">
</div><div class="inner_cell">
<div class="text_cell_render border-box-sizing rendered_html">
<h4 id="Load-datasets">Load datasets<a class="anchor-link" href="#Load-datasets">¶</a></h4>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<div class="cell border-box-sizing code_cell rendered">
<div class="input">
<div class="prompt input_prompt">In [142]:</div>
<div class="inner_cell">
    <div class="input_area">
<div class=" highlight hl-ipython3"><pre><span></span><span class="n">icustays</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">pd</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">read_csv</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="s1">'ICUSTAYS.csv'</span><span class="p">)</span>
<span class="n">labevents</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">pd</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">read_csv</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="s1">'LABEVENTS.csv'</span><span class="p">)</span>
<span class="n">admissions</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">pd</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">read_csv</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="s1">'ADMISSIONS.csv'</span><span class="p">)</span>
<span class="n">d_labitems</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">pd</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">read_csv</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="s1">'D_LABITEMS.csv'</span><span class="p">)</span>
<span class="n">patients</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">pd</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">read_csv</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="s1">'PATIENTS.csv'</span><span class="p">)</span>
</pre></div>

    </div>
</div>
</div>

</div>
<div class="cell border-box-sizing text_cell rendered"><div class="prompt input_prompt">
</div><div class="inner_cell">
<div class="text_cell_render border-box-sizing rendered_html">
<h3 id="Icustays-Processing">Icustays Processing<a class="anchor-link" href="#Icustays-Processing">¶</a></h3><p>Firstly, we want to implement icustays processing, obtaining the time of each patient entering and leaving ICU for the first time, and the length of stay in ICU.</p>

</div>
</div>
</div>
<div class="cell border-box-sizing code_cell rendered">
<div class="input">
<div class="prompt input_prompt">In [5]:</div>
<div class="inner_cell">
    <div class="input_area">
<div class=" highlight hl-ipython3"><pre><span></span><span class="n">icustays</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">head</span><span class="p">()</span>
</pre></div>

    </div>
</div>
</div>

<div class="output_wrapper">
<div class="output">


<div class="output_area">

    <div class="prompt output_prompt">Out[5]:</div>



<div class="output_html rendered_html output_subarea output_execute_result">
<div>
<style scoped>

        vertical-align: middle;
    }

        vertical-align: top;

        text-align: right;
    }
</style>

      <td>CCU</td>
      <td>CCU</td>
      <td>57</td>
      <td>57</td>
      <td>2186-12-25 21:08:04</td>

</div>
</div>

</div>

</div>
</div>

</div>
<div class="cell border-box-sizing code_cell rendered">
<div class="input">
<div class="prompt input_prompt">In [11]:</div>
<div class="inner_cell">
    <div class="input_area">
<div class=" highlight hl-ipython3"><pre><span></span><span class="c1"># Change the "INTIME" and "OUTTIME" to datetime format, sort the icustays datafrmae by "INTIME".</span>

<span class="n">icustays</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="s1">'INTIME'</span><span class="p">]</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">pd</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">to_datetime</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">icustays</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="s1">'INTIME'</span><span class="p">])</span>
<span class="n">icustays</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="s1">'OUTTIME'</span><span class="p">]</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">pd</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">to_datetime</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">icustays</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="s1">'OUTTIME'</span><span class="p">])</span>
<span class="n">icustays</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">sort_values</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="s1">'INTIME'</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">inplace</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="kc">True</span><span class="p">)</span>
</pre></div>

    </div>
</div>
</div>

</div>
<div class="cell border-box-sizing code_cell rendered">
<div class="input">
<div class="prompt input_prompt">In [19]:</div>
<div class="inner_cell">
    <div class="input_area">
<div class=" highlight hl-ipython3"><pre><span></span><span class="c1"># Delete rows with missing values in column "OUTTIME"</span>

<span class="n">icustays</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">drop</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">icustays</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="n">np</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">isnan</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">icustays</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="s1">'OUTTIME'</span><span class="p">])]</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">index</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">axis</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="mi">0</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">inplace</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="kc">True</span><span class="p">)</span>
</pre></div>

    </div>
</div>
</div>

</div>
<div class="cell border-box-sizing code_cell rendered">
<div class="input">
<div class="prompt input_prompt">In [20]:</div>
<div class="inner_cell">
    <div class="input_area">
<div class=" highlight hl-ipython3"><pre><span></span><span class="c1"># Obtain the intime, outtime for each patient to enter the icu for the first time</span>
<span class="c1"># Due to the sorting of intime, the data in the first row of each patient is the data entered into ICU for the first time</span>

<span class="n">time_dict</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="p">{}</span>
<span class="k">for</span> <span class="n">i</span> <span class="ow">in</span> <span class="n">icustays</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">index</span><span class="p">:</span>
    <span class="k">if</span> <span class="n">icustays</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="s1">'SUBJECT_ID'</span><span class="p">][</span><span class="n">i</span><span class="p">]</span> <span class="ow">not</span> <span class="ow">in</span> <span class="n">time_dict</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">keys</span><span class="p">():</span>
        <span class="n">time_dict</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="n">icustays</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="s1">'SUBJECT_ID'</span><span class="p">][</span><span class="n">i</span><span class="p">]]</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="p">{</span><span class="s1">'INTIME'</span> <span class="p">:</span> <span class="n">icustays</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="s1">'INTIME'</span><span class="p">][</span><span class="n">i</span><span class="p">],</span> 
                                                <span class="s1">'OUTTIME'</span> <span class="p">:</span> <span class="n">icustays</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="s1">'OUTTIME'</span><span class="p">][</span><span class="n">i</span><span class="p">]}</span>
</pre></div>

    </div>
</div>
</div>

</div>
<div class="cell border-box-sizing text_cell rendered"><div class="prompt input_prompt">
</div><div class="inner_cell">
<div class="text_cell_render border-box-sizing rendered_html">
<h3 id="Labevents-processing">Labevents processing<a class="anchor-link" href="#Labevents-processing">¶</a></h3>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<div class="cell border-box-sizing text_cell rendered"><div class="prompt input_prompt">
</div><div class="inner_cell">
<div class="text_cell_render border-box-sizing rendered_html">
<p>Secondly, we want to implement labevents processing. Each row of the datasets represents the value of a certain item tested by a certain patient. A patient may have multiple tests for one item. For a certain item, we want to obtain the value of the patient's first test during the first time entering ICU.</p>

</div>
</div>
</div>
<div class="cell border-box-sizing code_cell rendered">
<div class="input">
<div class="prompt input_prompt">In [22]:</div>
<div class="inner_cell">
    <div class="input_area">
<div class=" highlight hl-ipython3"><pre><span></span><span class="n">labevents</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">head</span><span class="p">()</span>
</pre></div>

    </div>
</div>
</div>

<div class="output_wrapper">
<div class="output">


<div class="output_area">

    <div class="prompt output_prompt">Out[22]:</div>



<div class="output_html rendered_html output_subarea output_execute_result">
<div>
<style scoped>
    .dataframe tbody tr th:only-of-type {
        vertical-align: middle;
    }

    .dataframe tbody tr th {
        vertical-align: top;
    }

    .dataframe thead th {
        text-align: right;
    }
</style>
<table border="1" class="dataframe">
  <thead>
    <tr style="text-align: right;">
      <th></th>
      <th>ROW_ID</th>
      <th>SUBJECT_ID</th>
      <th>HADM_ID</th>

</div><div class="inner_cell">
<div class="text_cell_render border-box-sizing rendered_html">
<p>For every patient and every item, obtain the first testing value during his first entry into ICU.</p>

</div>
</div>
</div>
<div class="cell border-box-sizing code_cell rendered">
<div class="input">
<div class="prompt input_prompt">In [45]:</div>
<div class="inner_cell">
    <div class="input_area">
<div class=" highlight hl-ipython3"><pre><span></span><span class="o">%%time</span>

<span class="n">itemid_dict</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="p">{}</span>
<span class="n">require_index</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="p">{}</span>
<span class="k">for</span> <span class="n">i</span> <span class="ow">in</span> <span class="n">labevents_icu</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">index</span><span class="p">:</span>
    <span class="k">if</span> <span class="n">labevents_icu</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="s1">'CHARTTIME'</span><span class="p">][</span><span class="n">i</span><span class="p">]</span> <span class="o">></span> <span class="n">time_dict</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="n">labevents_icu</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="s1">'SUBJECT_ID'</span><span class="p">][</span><span class="n">i</span><span class="p">]][</span><span class="s1">'INTIME'</span><span class="p">]</span> <span class="ow">and</span> <span class="n">labevents_icu</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="s1">'CHARTTIME'</span><span class="p">][</span><span class="n">i</span><span class="p">]</span> <span class="o"><</span> <span class="n">time_dict</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="n">labevents_icu</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="s1">'SUBJECT_ID'</span><span class="p">][</span><span class="n">i</span><span class="p">]][</span><span class="s1">'OUTTIME'</span><span class="p">]:</span>
        <span class="k">if</span> <span class="n">labevents_icu</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="s1">'SUBJECT_ID'</span><span class="p">][</span><span class="n">i</span><span class="p">]</span> <span class="ow">not</span> <span class="ow">in</span> <span class="n">itemid_dict</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">keys</span><span class="p">():</span>
            <span class="n">itemid_dict</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="n">labevents_icu</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="s1">'SUBJECT_ID'</span><span class="p">][</span><span class="n">i</span><span class="p">]]</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="p">[]</span>
        <span class="k">if</span> <span class="n">labevents_icu</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="s1">'ITEMID'</span><span class="p">][</span><span class="n">i</span><span class="p">]</span> <span class="ow">not</span> <span class="ow">in</span> <span class="n">itemid_dict</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="n">labevents_icu</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="s1">'SUBJECT_ID'</span><span class="p">][</span><span class="n">i</span><span class="p">]]:</span>
            <span class="n">itemid_dict</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="n">labevents_icu</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="s1">'SUBJECT_ID'</span><span class="p">][</span><span class="n">i</span><span class="p">]]</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">append</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">labevents_icu</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="s1">'ITEMID'</span><span class="p">][</span><span class="n">i</span><span class="p">])</span>
            <span class="n">require_index</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="n">i</span><span class="p">]</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="mi">0</span>
</pre></div>

<div class="cell border-box-sizing text_cell rendered"><div class="prompt input_prompt">
</div><div class="inner_cell">
<div class="text_cell_render border-box-sizing rendered_html">
<p>Since there are too many nan in convert, we want to keep the columns with missing values less than 20000, then delete the rows that has missing values in these columns.</p>

</div>
</div>
</div>
<div class="cell border-box-sizing code_cell rendered">
<div class="input">
<div class="prompt input_prompt">In [49]:</div>
<div class="inner_cell">
    <div class="input_area">
<div class=" highlight hl-ipython3"><pre><span></span><span class="n">drop_list</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="p">[]</span>
<span class="k">for</span> <span class="n">column</span> <span class="ow">in</span> <span class="n">convert</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">columns</span><span class="p">:</span>
    <span class="k">if</span> <span class="nb">sum</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">pd</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">isna</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">convert</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="n">column</span><span class="p">]))</span> <span class="o">></span> <span class="mi">20000</span><span class="p">:</span>
        <span class="n">drop_list</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">append</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">column</span><span class="p">)</span>
<span class="n">convert_dropna</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">convert</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">drop</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">drop_list</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">axis</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="mi">1</span><span class="p">)</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">dropna</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">axis</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="mi">0</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">how</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="s1">'any'</span><span class="p">)</span>
</pre></div>

    </div>
</div>
</div>

</div>
<div class="cell border-box-sizing code_cell rendered">
<div class="input">
<div class="prompt input_prompt">In [44]:</div>

<div class=" highlight hl-ipython3"><pre><span></span><span class="nb">len</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">drop_list</span><span class="p">)</span>
</pre></div>

<div class="cell border-box-sizing text_cell rendered"><div class="prompt input_prompt">
</div><div class="inner_cell">
<div class="text_cell_render border-box-sizing rendered_html">
<p>Some of the value cannot be transfered to float, therefore, we want to delete the rows with these string values.</p>

</div>
</div>
</div>
<div class="cell border-box-sizing code_cell rendered">
<div class="input">
<div class="prompt input_prompt">In [51]:</div>
<div class="inner_cell">
    <div class="input_area">
<div class=" highlight hl-ipython3"><pre><span></span><span class="k">def</span> <span class="nf">isfloat</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">i</span><span class="p">):</span>
    <span class="k">try</span><span class="p">:</span>
        <span class="nb">float</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">i</span><span class="p">)</span>
        <span class="k">return</span> <span class="kc">True</span>
    <span class="k">except</span><span class="p">:</span>
        <span class="k">return</span> <span class="kc">False</span>
    
<span class="n">drop_index</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="p">[]</span>
<span class="k">for</span> <span class="n">i</span> <span class="ow">in</span> <span class="n">convert_dropna</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">index</span><span class="p">:</span>
    <span class="k">for</span> <span class="n">column</span> <span class="ow">in</span> <span class="n">convert_dropna</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">columns</span><span class="p">:</span>
        <span class="k">if</span> <span class="ow">not</span> <span class="n">isfloat</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">convert_dropna</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="n">column</span><span class="p">][</span><span class="n">i</span><span class="p">]):</span>
            <span class="n">drop_index</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">append</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">i</span><span class="p">)</span>
            
<span class="n">convert_float</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">convert_dropna</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">drop</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">drop_index</span><span class="p">,</span><span class="n">axis</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="mi">0</span><span class="p">)</span>
</pre></div>

    </div>
</div>
</div>

</div>

<div class="cell border-box-sizing code_cell rendered">
<div class="input">
<div class="prompt input_prompt">In [151]:</div>
<div class="inner_cell">
    <div class="input_area">
<div class=" highlight hl-ipython3"><pre><span></span><span class="c1"># Obtain the HADM_ID, flag, admittime for each patient</span>

<span class="n">admissions</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="s1">'ADMITTIME'</span><span class="p">]</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">pd</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">to_datetime</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">admissions</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="s1">'ADMITTIME'</span><span class="p">])</span>
<span class="n">admissions</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">admissions</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">sort_values</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="s1">'ADMITTIME'</span><span class="p">)</span>
<span class="n">HADM_dict</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="p">{}</span>
<span class="n">admittime</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="p">{}</span>
<span class="n">flag_dict</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="p">{}</span>
<span class="k">for</span> <span class="n">i</span> <span class="ow">in</span> <span class="n">admissions</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">index</span><span class="p">:</span>
    <span class="k">if</span> <span class="n">admissions</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="s1">'SUBJECT_ID'</span><span class="p">][</span><span class="n">i</span><span class="p">]</span> <span class="ow">not</span> <span class="ow">in</span> <span class="n">HADM_dict</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">keys</span><span class="p">():</span>
        <span class="n">HADM_dict</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="n">admissions</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="s1">'SUBJECT_ID'</span><span class="p">][</span><span class="n">i</span><span class="p">]]</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">admissions</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="s1">'HADM_ID'</span><span class="p">][</span><span class="n">i</span><span class="p">]</span>
        <span class="n">admittime</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="n">admissions</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="s1">'SUBJECT_ID'</span><span class="p">][</span><span class="n">i</span><span class="p">]]</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">admissions</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="s1">'ADMITTIME'</span><span class="p">][</span><span class="n">i</span><span class="p">]</span>
        <span class="n">flag_dict</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="n">admissions</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="s1">'SUBJECT_ID'</span><span class="p">][</span><span class="n">i</span><span class="p">]]</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">admissions</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="s1">'HOSPITAL_EXPIRE_FLAG'</span><span class="p">][</span><span class="n">i</span><span class="p">]</span>
</pre></div>

<div class="cell border-box-sizing text_cell rendered"><div class="prompt input_prompt">
</div><div class="inner_cell">
<div class="text_cell_render border-box-sizing rendered_html">
<h3 id="Patients-processing">Patients processing<a class="anchor-link" href="#Patients-processing">¶</a></h3>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<div class="cell border-box-sizing text_cell rendered"><div class="prompt input_prompt">
</div><div class="inner_cell">
<div class="text_cell_render border-box-sizing rendered_html">
<p>This dataset includes patients information, we want to get the date of birthday and gender for each patient.</p>

</div>
</div>
</div>
<div class="cell border-box-sizing code_cell rendered">
<div class="input">
<div class="prompt input_prompt">In [144]:</div>
<div class="inner_cell">
    <div class="input_area">
<div class=" highlight hl-ipython3"><pre><span></span><span class="n">patients</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="s1">'GENDER'</span><span class="p">]</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">patients</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="s1">'GENDER'</span><span class="p">]</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">replace</span><span class="p">({</span><span class="s1">'F'</span><span class="p">:</span><span class="mi">0</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="s1">'M'</span><span class="p">:</span><span class="mi">1</span><span class="p">})</span>
<span class="n">patients</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="s1">'DOB'</span><span class="p">]</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">pd</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">to_datetime</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">patients</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="s1">'DOB'</span><span class="p">])</span>
</pre></div>

    </div>
</div>
</div>

</div>
<div class="cell border-box-sizing code_cell rendered">
<div class="input">
<div class="prompt input_prompt">In [145]:</div>
<div class="inner_cell">
    <div class="input_area">
<div class=" highlight hl-ipython3"><pre><span></span><span class="c1"># Obtain the gender_dict and age_dict</span>

<span class="n">gender_dict</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="p">{}</span>
<span class="n">age_dict</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="p">{}</span>
<span class="k">for</span> <span class="n">i</span> <span class="ow">in</span> <span class="n">patients</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">index</span><span class="p">:</span>
    <span class="n">gender_dict</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="n">patients</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="s1">'SUBJECT_ID'</span><span class="p">][</span><span class="n">i</span><span class="p">]]</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">patients</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="s1">'GENDER'</span><span class="p">][</span><span class="n">i</span><span class="p">]</span>
    <span class="n">age_dict</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="n">patients</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="s1">'SUBJECT_ID'</span><span class="p">][</span><span class="n">i</span><span class="p">]]</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">admittime</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="n">patients</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="s1">'SUBJECT_ID'</span><span class="p">][</span><span class="n">i</span><span class="p">]]</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">year</span> <span class="o">-</span> <span class="n">patients</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="s1">'DOB'</span><span class="p">][</span><span class="n">i</span><span class="p">]</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">year</span>
</pre></div>

    </div>
</div>
</div>

</div>
<div class="cell border-box-sizing text_cell rendered"><div class="prompt input_prompt">
</div><div class="inner_cell">
<div class="text_cell_render border-box-sizing rendered_html">
<h3 id="Combine">Combine<a class="anchor-link" href="#Combine">¶</a></h3><p>Based on subject_id, combine the variable we get.</p>

</div>
</div>
</div>
<div class="cell border-box-sizing code_cell rendered">
<div class="input">
<div class="prompt input_prompt">In [157]:</div>
<div class="inner_cell">
    <div class="input_area">
<div class=" highlight hl-ipython3"><pre><span></span><span class="c1"># Based on the HADM_dict obtained from admissions, obtain icu_los from icustays dataframe</span>
<span class="c1"># One hospitalization may enter the ICU multiple times, and the length needs to be accumulated</span>

<span class="n">icu_los</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="p">{}</span>
<span class="k">for</span> <span class="n">i</span> <span class="ow">in</span> <span class="n">icustays</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">index</span><span class="p">:</span>
    <span class="k">if</span> <span class="n">icustays</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="s1">'HADM_ID'</span><span class="p">][</span><span class="n">i</span><span class="p">]</span> <span class="o">==</span> <span class="n">HADM_dict</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="n">icustays</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="s1">'SUBJECT_ID'</span><span class="p">][</span><span class="n">i</span><span class="p">]]:</span>
        <span class="k">if</span> <span class="n">icustays</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="s1">'SUBJECT_ID'</span><span class="p">][</span><span class="n">i</span><span class="p">]</span> <span class="ow">not</span> <span class="ow">in</span> <span class="n">icu_los</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">keys</span><span class="p">():</span>
            <span class="n">icu_los</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="n">icustays</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="s1">'SUBJECT_ID'</span><span class="p">][</span><span class="n">i</span><span class="p">]]</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="mi">0</span>
        <span class="n">icu_los</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="n">icustays</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="s1">'SUBJECT_ID'</span><span class="p">][</span><span class="n">i</span><span class="p">]]</span> <span class="o">+=</span> <span class="n">icustays</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="s1">'LOS'</span><span class="p">][</span><span class="n">i</span><span class="p">]</span>

<div class="cell border-box-sizing text_cell rendered"><div class="prompt input_prompt">
</div><div class="inner_cell">
<div class="text_cell_render border-box-sizing rendered_html">
<h3 id="Variables-selection">Variables selection<a class="anchor-link" href="#Variables-selection">¶</a></h3>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<div class="cell border-box-sizing text_cell rendered"><div class="prompt input_prompt">
</div><div class="inner_cell">
<div class="text_cell_render border-box-sizing rendered_html">
<p>There are too many variables, we want to choose 10 variables for the next part of data analysis. Therefore, we use a simple logistic regression to select variables.</p>

</div>
</div>
</div>
<div class="cell border-box-sizing code_cell rendered">
<div class="input">
<div class="prompt input_prompt">In [190]:</div>
<div class="inner_cell">
    <div class="input_area">
<div class=" highlight hl-ipython3"><pre><span></span><span class="c1"># Map the data to the range of 0-1</span>

<span class="n">combine_nor</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">combine</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">copy</span><span class="p">()</span>
<span class="k">for</span> <span class="n">column</span> <span class="ow">in</span> <span class="n">combine_nor</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">columns</span><span class="p">:</span>
    <span class="n">combine_nor</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="n">column</span><span class="p">]</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">combine_nor</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="n">column</span><span class="p">]</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">astype</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="s1">'float'</span><span class="p">)</span> <span class="o">-</span> <span class="nb">min</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">combine_nor</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="n">column</span><span class="p">]</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">astype</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="s1">'float'</span><span class="p">))</span>
    <span class="n">combine_nor</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="n">column</span><span class="p">]</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">combine_nor</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="n">column</span><span class="p">]</span> <span class="o">/</span> <span class="nb">max</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">combine_nor</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="n">column</span><span class="p">])</span>
</pre></div>

    </div>
</div>
</div>

</div>
<div class="cell border-box-sizing code_cell rendered">
<div class="input">
<div class="prompt input_prompt">In [191]:</div>
<div class="inner_cell">
    <div class="input_area">
<div class=" highlight hl-ipython3"><pre><span></span><span class="c1">#Logistic regression</span>

<span class="n">x_column</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">combine_nor</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">columns</span><span class="p">[:</span><span class="o">-</span><span class="mi">1</span><span class="p">]</span>
<span class="n">x</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">combine_nor</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="n">x_column</span><span class="p">]</span>
<span class="n">y</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">combine_nor</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="s1">'flag'</span><span class="p">]</span>
<span class="n">X_train</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">X_test</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">y_train</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">y_test</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">train_test_split</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">x</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">y</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">test_size</span><span class="o">=</span><span class="mf">0.2</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">random_state</span><span class="o">=</span><span class="mi">123</span><span class="p">)</span>
<span class="n">clf</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">LogisticRegression</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">random_state</span><span class="o">=</span><span class="mi">0</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">class_weight</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="s1">'balanced'</span><span class="p">)</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">fit</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">X_train</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">y_train</span><span class="p">)</span>
<span class="n">clf</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">score</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">X_test</span><span class="p">,</span><span class="n">y_test</span><span class="p">)</span>
</pre></div>

    </div>
</div>
</div>

<div class="output_wrapper">
<div class="output">


<div class="output_area">

    <div class="prompt"></div>


<div class="output_subarea output_stream output_stderr output_text">

    <span class="n">combine_nor</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="n">column</span><span class="p">]</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">combine_nor</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="n">column</span><span class="p">]</span> <span class="o">/</span> <span class="nb">max</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">combine_nor</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="n">column</span><span class="p">])</span>

<span class="n">X_train</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">X_test</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">y_train</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">y_test</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">train_test_split</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">x</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">y</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">test_size</span><span class="o">=</span><span class="mf">0.2</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">random_state</span><span class="o">=</span><span class="mi">123</span><span class="p">)</span>
<span class="n">clf</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">LogisticRegression</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">random_state</span><span class="o">=</span><span class="mi">0</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">class_weight</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="s1">'balanced'</span><span class="p">)</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">fit</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">X_train</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">y_train</span><span class="p">)</span>
<span class="n">clf</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">score</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">X_test</span><span class="p">,</span><span class="n">y_test</span><span class="p">)</span>
</pre></div>
